steps: In a medium bowl, place in the Gochuyang, Honey, Soy Sauce, Rice Vinegar, Sesame Oil, Ginger, Garlic and Crushed Pepper, stir until mixed.
On a cutting board, pinerce the steak with a fork and cut into small strips (About 3/4 of an inch long). Let beef marinate.
Wash one cup of rice and add to rice cooker with a 2:1 ratio (2 parts water for 1 part rice).
After letting the beef marinate for at least 40 minutes, cook in a medium pan for 3 minutes on each side.
recipes.title: Beef Bulgogi

steps: In a bowl mix together, whole milk yogurt, all the spices, and kosher salt (optional: Add in 1 tbsp of garlic achaar). Whisk together.
In a cutting board, pinch chicken with a fork and cut down to bite sized pieces.
Add in the chicken and toss to thoroughly coat. Cover with plastic wrap and marinate for 20 minutes or overnight in the fridge.
Wash and rinse rice twice times through then cook via pressure cooker or rice cooker.
In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, add oil to coat the bottom. Sear chicken on both sides 3-4 minutes per side. Place to the side.
Add in the tikka masala sauce into the sauce pan. (Optional: Add 1 tbsp of garlic achaar)
Let it simmer for 10-15 minutes or until chicken is completely cooked through.
recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
